title: Howard Bryant on Belichick, 'signature' NBA Franchises and more!
description:
Bomani Jones chats with Howard Bryant about Bill Belichick proving his doubters wrong by rebuilding the Patriots (5:14), as well as the Lakers-Celtics rivalry (27:09), the loss of "signature" franchise players in the NBA (35:56) and more.

itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: The Right Time: Howard Bryant gets real Boston...Patriots, complaining about the Lakers and Celtics and more!
